Package com.ktzvhad.rents.security

package com.ktzvhad.rents.security
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.ktzvhad.rents
    The KosherJava Zmanim library is an API for a specialized calendar that can calculate different astronomical times including sunrise and sunset and Jewish zmanim or religious times for prayers and other Jewish religious duties.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppUser
    The AppUser class represents a user entity in the application.
    JwtRequestFilter
    The JwtRequestFilter class is a filter that intercepts every HTTP request to extract and validate a JWT token, authenticating the user in the process.
    JwtResponse
    The JwtResponse class represents the response sent to the client after successful authentication.
    JwtTokenUtil
    The JwtTokenUtil class provides utility methods for working with JWT (JSON Web Tokens).
    PasswordEncryptionUtil
    Utility class for decrypting passwords using AES encryption with CBC mode and PKCS5 padding.
    Role
    Entity representing a role in the application security context.
    RoleAssignmentRequest
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) used for assigning roles to a user.
    RoleConstants
    A utility class that holds constant values representing user roles within the system.
    SecureKeyGenerator
    The SecureKeyGenerator class is a utility to generate secure cryptographic keys for signing JWT tokens.
    UserApiKey
    The UserApiKey entity represents the API key and secret associated with a user in the system.
    UserData
    The UserData entity represents additional user-specific data that can be associated with a user in the system.
